document_data.mainbody:
'''"A Deep and Creeping Darkness"''' is a short adventure module for 4{{th}}–level players, collected in the anthology ''[[Candlekeep Mysteries]]'', where players explore a seemingly abandoned village inhabited by [[meenlock]]s.
{{TOC limit|2}}
document_data.Synopsis: In [[1492 DR]], a group of [[adventurer]]s are hired by a mining and exploration group to investigate what happened to the village of [[Vermeillon]], the site of a lucrative [[platinum]] mine. Through [[divination]] [[magic]], the adventurers learn that the information they seek can be found in a book in [[Candlekeep]]. There, they find the tome ''[[A Deep and Creeping Darkness]]'' which describes a mining accident in Vermeillon and how many of the villagers vanished immediately after, before the town was abandoned altogether. The adventurers decide to travel to [[Maerin (town)|Maerin]], the closest town to Vermeillon, to investigate.
